reviewText: rubbish only bought it because my partner was in it

Saw this film some 8 years ago, still able to recite the moneylender scene, but growing weaker as time goes by. With a "hint" of Python to it, this appeals to all Python lovers. One of the all time classic comedies, need to brush up on the memorising of the script, and sing a long with the rowing song. An absolute must.
Any copies out there.
